cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote S port C to 0 causes connection failures and disrupts SCTP communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting Ta4 to [0, 0] causes timing misalignment in the front-haul, leading to synchronization failures and data transmission errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 設定為 [0, 0] 會導致前傳中的時序錯位，造成同步失敗和數據傳輸錯誤。
